items.name: Dread Hoof
explicitMods: Has 1 Abyssal Socket
+73 to Armour
27% increased Movement Speed
10% increased Movement Speed if you haven't been Hit Recently
Cannot be Poisoned

socketedItems.secDescrText: Creates a magical brand which can attach to a nearby enemy. It periodically activates while attached, triggering linked spells. The brand will detach if the enemy dies.
explicitMods: Activates every 1 second while Attached
Increases and Reductions to Cast Speed also apply to this Skill's Activation frequency
10% increased Activation frequency
Can be Attached for a total Duration of 3.00 seconds
Can be Detached for a total Duration of 5.00 seconds
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

explicitMods: Supported Skills have 40% reduced Chaining range
Projectiles from Supported Skills have 4.8 metres maximum range
Supported Skills have 40% less Area of Effect
Supported Skills deal 63% less Damage
Supported Skills Deal 59% more Damage with Hits against Branded Enemy
Supported Skills are Triggered by Arcanist Brand, from the Brand's location
hybrid.secDescrText: Supports spell skills that have no reservation. Cannot support skills used by totems, traps or mines. Cannot modify the skills of minions.

properties.name: Fire, Lightning, Spell, AoE, Duration, Physical

socketedItems.secDescrText: An expanding wave of energy surges forward, damaging enemies in a cone-shaped area over a duration. Each enemy hit is inflicted with Exposure matching the element of which they took the highest damage. Only one Wave of Conviction can be active at a time
explicitMods: Deals 1476 to 2214 Physical Damage
25% of Physical Damage Converted to Lightning Damage
Base duration is 0.50 seconds
Base secondary duration is 4.00 seconds
38% increased Skill Effect Duration
20% increased Elemental Damage
25% of Physical Damage Converted to Fire Damage
Exposure applies -15% to Elemental Resistance matching highest Damage taken
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Supports any skill that hits enemies.
explicitMods: Supported Skills deal 19% more Fire Damage
Supported Skills have 25% chance to Ignite
Supported Skills deal 10% increased Fire Damage
Enemies Ignited by Supported Skills have -10% to Fire Resistance
socketedItems.descrText: This is a Support Gem. It does not grant a bonus to your character, but to skills in sockets connected to it. Place into an item socket connected to a socket containing the Skill Gem you wish to augment. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.name: Hollow Prism
implicitMods: Corrupted Blood cannot be inflicted on you
explicitMods: +31 to maximum Life
+12% to Lightning Resistance
9 to 15 Added Spell Chaos Damage while holding a Shield
47% chance to Avoid Bleeding
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an Abyssal Socket on an Item or into an allocated Jewel Socket on the Passive Skill Tree. Right click to remove from the Socket.

items.name: Rathpith Globe
implicitMods: +2 to Level of Socketed Duration Gems
explicitMods: 13% Chance to Block Spell Damage
147% increased Energy Shield
10% increased maximum Life
Sacrifice 10% of your Life when you Use or Trigger a Spell Skill
5% increased Critical Strike Chance for Spells per 100 Player Maximum Life
5% increased Spell Damage per 100 Player Maximum Life
flavourText: The Vaal emptied their slaves of beating hearts,
and left a mountain of twitching dead.
